description: Usually adressed by her nickname, Kaorin, she firstly appears in the show as a student in Yukari-sensei`s class. She is a member of the Astronomic Club, and is obliged to take part in its activities, thus she is often unable to spend vacations with her classmates. Kaori`s respect for Sakaki intentionally develops into love interest. Also, Kaorin becomes the main aim of Kimura-sensei`s attention. Her character is usually calm and shy, however, it drastically changes when Sakaki gets involved.
name: Kaori
